Text.Value: Where are you from?
Leave.
Ketheric Thorm... is unequalled... eternal...
Wizard... General Thorm's favoured...
How can I extinguish the torch flames?
Continual Flame - an unquenchable light. Costs a queen's crown worth of ruby dust to summon.
How do I destroy Ketheric Thorm?
What is your profession?
How are the torches still burning?
Dogs in the distance. Just outside the light - for now.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: In the distance, the party hears a shadow mastiff's howl. They turn their heads in response, then back to the corpse.

Text.Value: The mastiffs still prowl. Quench those lights, lure them in - let's see if these creatures bleed.
Hear that? The light might fend them off, but those mastiffs are still lurking about.
How did you die?
Sounds like the mastiffs are still here, beyond the light.
Those beasts still prowl the eternal night, but at least they're afraid of the fire.
Spell... Continual Flame...
Well, we can be grateful for the torches. Without them, those beasts would be on us in no time.
Destroy torches...
How did you end up here?
To Waterdeep born... to Moonrise called...
True Soul of the Absolute... Korliss by name...
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
*The corpse regards you lifelessly.*
Who were you in life?
Trapped... shadow mastiffs... repelled them with flame...
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
Unslaked hunger... unquenched thirst...
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

Synopsis: SwD dialog for dead True Soul that died of hunger/thirst while hiding from Shadow Mastiffs in the island of light. They used Continual Flame spell to make torches around them ever-burning, which allowed them to hide there indefinitely (until they died). The kicker - description of the spell says that each casting uses Ruby Dust worth 50gp, so, presumably, that's one rich True Soul.
